org.matrix.androidsdk.call

Class CallSoundsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.call.CallSoundsManager

  • public class CallSoundsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the call sound. It is in charge of playing ring tones and managing the audio focus.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CallSoundsManager.OnAudioConfigurationUpdateListener
      Track the audio configuration change (like speaker, micro and so on).
      static interface  CallSoundsManager.OnAudioFocusListener
      Track the audio focus update.
      static interface  CallSoundsManager.OnMediaListener
      Track the media statuses.

      • setCallSpeakerphoneOn

        public void setCallSpeakerphoneOn(boolean isOn)
        Set the speakerphone ON or OFF.
        Parameters:
        isOn - true to enable the speaker (ON), false to disable it (OFF)

      • setSpeakerphoneOn

        public void setSpeakerphoneOn(boolean isInCall,
                              boolean isSpeakerOn)
        Save the current speaker status and the audio mode, before updating those values. The audio mode depends on if there is a call in progress. If audio mode set to AudioManager.MODE_IN_COMMUNICATION and a media player is in ON, the media player will reduce its audio level.
        Parameters:
        isInCall - true when the speaker is updated during call.
        isSpeakerOn - true to turn on the speaker (false to turn it off)

      • toggleSpeaker

        public void toggleSpeaker()
        Toggle the speaker

      • isSpeakerphoneOn

        public boolean isSpeakerphoneOn()
        Returns:
        true if the speaker is turned on.

      • setMicrophoneMute

        public void setMicrophoneMute(boolean mute)
        Mute the microphone.
        Parameters:
        mute - true to mute the microphone

      • isMicrophoneMute

        public boolean isMicrophoneMute()
        Returns:
        true if the microphone is mute.
